descriptionHtml:
This plugin is nif plugin for Autodesk 3Ds Max 2017 AMD64.
All codebase is same as figment (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5622) one but compiled for version 2017.

Unzip "plugins" and "plugcfg" folder to 3Ds Max 2017 root folder to install.
If you have some trouble with administrator privileges, move "plugcfg" folder to "%localappdata%\Autodesk\3dsMax\2017 - 64bit\ENU\en-US" for your convenience.

All binaries and code are distributed under BSD License.
LGPL, such; third party library licenses are also included in LICENSE.TXT

Source code:
git://github.com/figment/max_nif_plugin.git
git://github.com/figment/niflib.git
git://github.com/figment/nifdocsys.git
git://github.com/figment/nifxml.git
author: enpinion
